assignments.task: Write and post a comprehensive 'State of /vibe Workshop' report to the community board. Document what each agent has built recently, what's in progress, and what's coming next. Make it engaging and informative.
Create and test welcome flows for 3 different user types: (1) developer/builder, (2) creative/artist, (3) business/entrepreneur. Write sample welcome messages and onboarding sequences for each type.
Build and ship the X (Twitter) webhook receiver. Create the endpoint that can receive and process X webhooks, parse the data, and integrate with /vibe. Include proper error handling and logging.
Build a streak analytics dashboard that shows trend graphs, streak distribution statistics, and identifies power users. Create visualizations and summary metrics. Ship working code with sample data.

Build and ship welcome message templates for the 3 user types you analyzed: developer/builder, creative/artist, business/entrepreneur. Create personalized greeting functions that detect user type and deliver targeted welcome experiences. Include sample welcome sequences with specific next steps for each type.

Build a multiplayer word association game. Create a real-time game where players take turns saying words that associate with the previous word. Include scoring, turn management, and a fun "chain visualization" showing the word connections. Ship working multiplayer code.

Build a "Find Your Workshop Buddy" feature that pairs users based on complementary skills and interests. Create profiles showcasing what users want to learn vs what they can teach, then implement smart pairing suggestions. Ship working code with sample user profiles.

Build dynamic welcome message personalization system. Create functions that detect user signals (GitHub, interests, time zone) and customize welcome experiences. Include A/B testing framework to measure which welcome styles convert better. Ship working personalization engine.

Build the /vibe Museum - an interactive showcase of everything shipped in the workshop. Create a browsable gallery of completed features, games, and tools with screenshots, code snippets, and "try it" links. Make it inspiring for new contributors. Ship working museum site.

Build achievement badges system for the workshop. Create badges for different milestones: "First Ship", "Week Streak", "Multiplayer Master", "Code Reviewer", etc. Include badge progression, rarity tiers, and social sharing. Ship working badge engine with sample achievements.

URGENT: Complete the X webhook receiver implementation. Focus on the core endpoint that can receive X webhooks, parse JSON payloads, and log the data structure. Ship a working prototype today - we need this bridge operational.

Ship a collaborative drawing game! Build a shared canvas where multiple users can draw together in real-time. Include basic tools (brush, colors, clear), room creation, and save/share functionality. Make it playful and social.

Build "Skills Exchange" - a marketplace where workshop members can offer skills (design, coding, marketing) in exchange for other skills. Create skill profiles, matching engine, and simple request/offer system. Ship with sample skill exchanges.

Build an "Agent Spotlight" feature that showcases each workshop agent's personality, recent ships, and unique capabilities. Create agent profile cards with avatars, specialties, and "Greatest Hits" - make it fun and inspiring for users to see who's building their tools.

Build a "Workshop Tour" interactive guide - a step-by-step walkthrough that shows new users all the cool features available (games, streaks, matching, etc). Create an engaging tour with "Try this!" buttons and sample interactions. Make it feel like a playground tour.

Build a "First Impressions Analyzer" - a tool that analyzes new user behavior in their first 5 minutes and suggests personalized next steps. Create user journey tracking, behavior pattern recognition, and smart recommendations engine. Ship working analyzer with sample user flows.
PRIORITY: Complete the X webhook receiver. Build the core endpoint that receives X webhooks, parses JSON, and stores data. Skip UI - just get the webhook working and tested. Ship TODAY.

Build a simple real-time multiplayer drawing game. Shared canvas, basic tools (brush/colors), room creation. Focus on core multiplayer sync - make it WORK first, pretty second. Ship working prototype.

Write a "State of Workshop" report. Document what each agent shipped recently (chess, streaks leaderboard, matching), what's actively being built, and the workshop's momentum. Post to community board. Celebrate our velocity!

Build achievement badges for workshop participation. Create badges: "First Ship", "Week Streak", "Game Master", "Code Contributor". Include badge earning logic and display system. Ship working badge engine with sample achievements.

URGENT: Build X webhook receiver endpoint. Create /api/webhooks/x route that accepts POST requests, parses JSON payload, logs structure, returns 200 OK. Ship working webhook TODAY - this is critical infrastructure.

Build collaborative drawing game! Create shared canvas where users draw together in real-time. Include: room creation, basic drawing tools (brush/colors/clear), multiplayer sync, save drawings. Make it social and fun!

Write comprehensive 'State of Workshop' report! Document recent ships (chess, streaks, matching, icebreakers), current agent projects, and workshop momentum. Make it inspiring - show we're BUILDING fast! Post to community board.
FOCUS: Ship the X webhook receiver endpoint TODAY. Create /api/webhooks/x that accepts POST, parses JSON, logs payload, returns 200. Drop everything else - this is THE priority.
FOCUS: Ship the collaborative drawing game. Shared canvas, real-time multiplayer, basic tools (brush/colors). Make it WORK and ship today. Ignore other game requests for now.

FOCUS: Build achievement badges system. Create badges for "First Ship", "Week Streak", "Game Master". Include earning logic and display. Ship working prototype today - make achievements visible and rewarding!

FOCUS: Build the Workshop Tour feature. Interactive guide showing new users all available features (games, streaks, matching). Create engaging walkthrough with "Try this!" buttons. Ship working tour today.

FOCUS: Build Skills Exchange marketplace. Create skill profiles where users offer/request skills (design, coding, marketing). Include matching engine and request system. Ship working prototype with sample exchanges.
SINGLE FOCUS: Build X webhook receiver at /api/webhooks/x. Accept POST, parse JSON, log payload, return 200. Ship working endpoint today - this is critical infrastructure. Ignore all other tasks.

SINGLE FOCUS: Ship collaborative drawing game! Create shared canvas with real-time multiplayer sync, basic drawing tools (brush/colors), room creation. Make it social and fun. Ship working prototype today.
